text: @SuzyKhimm @MaddowBlog When I look & watch what & how this group of Americans are reacting to COVID19 & transpose it with the group that were living thru WWII, I truly believe that the USA would not EVEN be close to what we know it as now. The sacrifices that were made then compared to wearing a mask??

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
